name: American Digitals
overview: American Digitals an importer and reseller of Electronics, Computers, Communications, Satellite and Security Surveillance Systems. American Digitals provides audio, video, satellite, security, communication, intercom and variety of other products for residential and commercial applications. All aspects of entertainment, security and communication needs for homes and businesses including custom installation and programming are provided. Since 1999 over 10,000 clients are served in local market alone. visit us at www.americandigitals.com for additional product and service information.
